column4: having problems with conky, it opens for a while then the process closes, does anyone know what this could be?
having problems with conky, it opens for a while then the process closes, does anyone know what this could be?
you running it with & ?
its a terminal thing
if yourun conky like this: conky &
it will run in the background and give you the console back
ahh right, i put conky -c .conkyrc to run it
if you run it without & it will keep the console til you close conky or press CTRL+C
no, just conky &
yeah it does that
how do i run my .conkyrc file with that command, do i add it to the end?
its default so its picked up automatically
it opens the standard conky window, which is not the .conkyrc i want
is it ~/.conkyrc
cd ~/; ls -a
it is not in that list
then you need to copy the file there
ok, how do i do that?
ok, first find where the .conkyrc file is that you've been playing with
then cp /path/to/.conkyrc ~/
k sec and ill find it
cp /path/to/.conkyrc ~/
ty
